DESIGN AND PROCEDURES The study randomize control trial , plan recruit 1000 patient underwent coronary artery bypass grafting 2015 , randomize either intervention group control group , test effectiveness smartphone base APP focus improve patient medication adherence . Patients randomized intervention group install APP intervene . The patient randomize control group receive usual care . The investigator follow patient group face face telephone interview 3-month 6-month randomization . The 6-month effect intervention evaluate . The APP contain education material secondary prevention coronary artery disease , patient surf read easily . The APP also collect information medication prescription doctor , remind patient every time take medication , ask feedback 8 pm everyday . The APP also push one patient-specific questionnaire 10-15 question weekly , collect information patient ' medication adherence self-administration blood pressure , blood lipid , glucose , physical activity , diet body weight . APP push series recommendation right patient ' finish questionnaire help improve secondary prevention . The coordinator participate site interview patient baseline , 3-month 6-month randomization , information medication adherence , major event outcomes coronary artery bypass graft quality life . The primary outcome measure Chinese version 8-item Morisky medication adherence scale already validate Chinese population .
